Entries.Introduction: Hello. I'm Charles. Nice to meet you.
Entries.Mon: Hi.#$e#Mhm...Oh sorry.I'm working.#$e#Are you here to see Yri?
Entries.Mon2: Hello.#$e#Can I help you?#$e# Sorry, I'm not too talkative.#$e#Yri talks enough for the both of us$h
Entries.Mon4: Hello.#$e#Sorry if it seems like I'm ignoring you. I just don't have much to say.
Entries.Mon6: Yri talks a lot about you.#$b# She really likes you.
Entries.Mon8: I know, I'm not the most talkative person, I appreciate that you still talk to me every time you come over$h
Entries.Mon10: Yri and I have been together for years.#$e#She's still as beautiful as the day I met her.
Entries.Tue: How did you find me here?
Entries.Wed: Hi.#$e#What I do?#$b# I work as web-developer.
Entries.Wed2: %Charles is fully focused on work he doesn't seem to notice you.
Entries.Wed4: Oh. Sorry. You were saying something?#$e# I'm fine thanks for asking.#$e# And you?
Entries.Wed6: Sometimes I talk to Sebastian if I get stuck on a bug.#$e# He knows a lot.
Entries.Wed8: Yri loves Flowers. She takes a lot of inspiration from nature.#$e# It's cute.$h
Entries.Wed10: We were lucky to crash at Robins after we arrived in Pelican town.#$e# We're in the same age range as her children.#$e# I think Sebastian and I get along well.
Entries.Thu: Sorry I don't have much to say.
Entries.Thu2: Yri walks Nala every morning and we walk together every evening.#$e# It's our form of taking a break.$h
Entries.Thu4: Hello @, I hope everything is going well with the farm?
Entries.Thu6: I wouldn't say I'm shy. I just don't have much to say.#$e# I simply like to listen to people.
Entries.Thu8: Hi. @, I know this is random but I just want to say I'm glad you're such a good friend to us.#$e# I'm glad you're here.
Entries.Thu10: I have many acquaintances but only a few friends.#$e#I'm happy to count you as a friend.
Entries.Fri: Hi.#$e# Yri isn't home today.#$e#She's on a construction-site.
Entries.Fri2: What I do for fun?#$b# I like to play video games.
Entries.Fri4: Nala is a great dog.She is such a cuddlebug#$e#Why i call her a cuddlebug? Oh, Yri likes to call her that. I just adapted it.
Entries.Fri6: I was working with Joja before I went freelance.#$e# I like this arrangement better, I wasn't build for corporate work.
Entries.Fri8: Sometimes I'm worried that I don't do enough.#$e# I only work, eat, sleep, repeat.#$e# I have to force myself to go out once a week...$s#$b# I'm glad Yri is the one who forces me to go out ever once in a while.$h
Entries.Fri10: My family was quite surprised when I told them me and Yri are a pair.#$b# Why? I never told them about her before she introduced herself.#$b#They're still mad about that.#$b# I know, don't look at me like this, I feel bad too.
Entries.Sat2: Be careful if you befriend Yri.#$e# Haha don't look at me like that, I was just joking.$h#$b# Yri is super nice don't worry.
Entries.Sat4: Nala was originally Yri's dog.#$e# She loves her to bits.#$e# I of course love her too, she's part of our family.$l
Entries.Sat6: If you ever need a website promoting your farm you can come to me.#$e# I would be happy to work on it.
Entries.Sat8: Yri and you both are very similar.#$e# You and her, you two are very persisting.#$e# Don't worry that's a good thing.
Entries.Sat10: I don't really feel the need to talk. I'm glad you understand this.#$e# A lot of people think I'm rude but I'm just the listener type.
Entries.Sun: I promised Yri to take care of the garden every sunday.#$e# I didn't like it at first but it's not that bad actually.
Entries.Sun4: Hello, @.#$e#Mhm what I do today? Probably garden-work and then play some games.#$e#Nothing too fancy.
Entries.Sun6: I'm glad to see you and Yri get along well.#$e# She's working a lot and hasn't much time to socialize.#$e#Thank you.
Entries.Sun8: Sometimes I wonder why Yri is so fascinated with me.#$e# I'm just sitting here merely existing.#$e# But I'm happy it's the way it is because I feel the same way$l
Entries.Sun10: Yri wanted to marry me since the day we've met.#$e# Yes, she's hopeless.#$e#But I still love her for that.
Entries.spring_Mon: Hello.#$e#I feel quite energetic today I think I can get some work done.
Entries.spring_Wed: Spring is nice#$e#Maybe I should go outside some more.#$e#Mhm......
Entries.spring_Fri: I talk a lot about Yri.#$b# I know this, I think it's because she and I spend so much time together.#$e# Does she talk about me too?
Entries.spring_Sat: Sometimes I wonder if people think that I'm a broken record.#$b# You know, I don't have much to say and when I talk I always repeat the same old line.$s
Entries.spring_Sun: Working in the garden is actually quite therapeutic, don't you think?
Entries.summer_Mon: I'm glad we have air condition#$e#My computer can heat up the room quite quickly.
Entries.summer_Wed: Summer isn't my season.#$e#I already woke up sweating.$s
Entries.summer_Thu: I wish I could sleep in on saturdays but the sun is already up at ungodly hours.#$e# Maybe I can talk with Yri about some blinds.
Entries.summer_Fri: Yri loves horror.#$b# I know she doesn't look like it but it's true.$h
Entries.summer_Sat: Hello.#$b#%I can see huge rings under Charles' eyes, he looks like he hasn't slept in quite some time.
Entries.summer_Sun: Have you been to the fern isles before?#$b# We live in a state of endless summer there.#$b#It might be a dream for many but I never was someone who could handle heat very well...$s
Entries.fall_Mon: Do you cook for yourself?#$b#We're mostly too busy to cook so we order a lot of food from Gus.
Entries.fall_Wed: It's harvest season right?#$e#I hope you have plentiful harvest.
Entries.fall_Thu: Do you grow sunflowers on your farm?#$b# I would love to buy some from you if you do, i like eating the seeds$h
Entries.fall_Fri: Yri works too much, sometimes I feel like she forgets I'm even there...$s
Entries.fall_Sat: I moved with Yri when she went to the Gotoro Empire.#$b# I left all my friends behind on the fern isles.#$b# But it isn't too bad we still chat over Harmony.
Entries.fall_Sun: I feel like the leaves never stop falling in fall, I have to clean the walkway ever day.$s
Entries.winter_Mon: Winter is my favorite season.#$e#Why? I just like the cold.
Entries.winter_Thu: Yri hates the cold.#$e#She often borrows my hoodies, she looks cute in them$l
Entries.winter_Fri: Be careful, the roads are quite icy.
Entries.winter_Sat: I think the best part of winter is looking outside and watching the snow fall.
Entries.winter_Sun: Do you have a fireplace in your house?#$b# On cold winter days nothing feels better than to sit next to a hot fire.$h
Entries.spring_27: Tomorrow is Yri's birthday.#$b# What I got her?#$b# You aren't a spy sent by her, aren't you?#$b# Ok, keep it a secret I got us tickets to ZuzuLand$h
Entries.spring_28: Yri loved her gift, she's smiling all day$h
Entries.spring_7: Yri got Lewis a present, I don't know why but it makes her happy so I'm happy too.$h
Entries.spring_10: Vincent is such a cute child...#$b# I wish we had one too.
Entries.spring_12: Tomorrow is the Egg Festival?#$b#Oh yeah I remember, Yri told me about it.#$b# Yeah, we will be there.
Entries.spring_23: I can't wait to dance with Yri tomorrow.#$b#She's a terrible dancer.$h
Entries.summer_9: It's Maru's Birthday tomorrow, Sebastian and I went shopping in Zuzu City to get her something nice.
Entries.summer_10: Do you know what you want to put into the Soup tomorrow?#$b#Yri got a lot of Coconuts from her parents so we'll add them.
Entries.summer_19: Demetrius and I don't really get along well but I'll gift him something anyways.#$b#But only because Yri convinced me.$s
Entries.summer_24: I got Willy a new Fishing Rod. I hope he likes it.
Entries.summer_27: The Dance of the Moonlight Jellies is one of my favorite events.#$b# I have something special planned for it.$h#$b#Sorry, it's a secret so I can't tell.
Entries.fall_15: Are you prepared for the Fair? I'm sure you will score high.$h
Entries.fall_21: It's Robins birthday today we go over later to celebrate with her.$h
Entries.fall_26: Do you attend the Spirits Eve Festival tomorrow? Yri and I helped a bit with the decoration. I hope you like it.$h
Entries.winter_7: I want to build a snowman with Yri, sometimes it's nice to be a child again.$h
Entries.winter_10: I sent Seb a digital birthday cake over Harmony at 3AM.#$b#And he replied instantly#$b#. I'm glad I'm not the only one with a messed up sleep schedule.$h
Entries.winter_14: The Nightmaket is a great time for us to stock up on Fern Ilse products.
Entries.winter_23: Leah stopped by this morning to chat a bit with Yri.#$b# The two made plans to celebrate Leah's birthday at the Stardrop Saloon.
Entries.winter_24: What is your secret friend? Mine? #$b#I got Clint, I don't know him well but Yri told me he likes Blues so I got him a CD.$h
Entries.winter_28: Only a few hours until new year. Looking back at it, I hope you had a good year, @.
Entries.joja_Begin: ...Joja. Of course they would turn it into a warehouse.$s

Entries.cc_Bridge: We saw that you repaired the bridge.#$b#Good job.
Entries.cc_Bus: The bus is running again? That's great news.#$b#I mean it.

Entries.cc_Complete: Yri is so happy. She is talking nonstop about it.#$b# Thank you, @.
Entries.movieTheater: I can't wait to take Yri here.#$b# Did you know that she loves horror movies?
Entries.pamHouseUpgrade: Yri told me about it. You truly have a heart of gold.#$b# I'm sure Pam and Penny are grateful beyond means
Entries.pamHouseUpgradeAnonymous: Yri told me about it. Don't worry about me. I takes secrets to the gave.#$b#You truly have a heart of gold.#$b# I'm sure Pam and Penny are grateful beyond means.
